" The situation is deplorable " .
The Central Bank of the Russian Federation has again recorded the deplorable situation in the country in the area of credit for citizens. The number of Rossians with 3 and more arms loans continued to rise in the second half of 2023.
17:07, 26 January
Salary increases in the Krasnodar Krai were one of the lowest in the USF
As at the end of December of the end of the calendar year, the proposed wages in FLS had increased by 25 per cent compared with December 2022.
15:08, 26 January
In Kaliningrad, solar energy components were produced
As part of a working visit to the Vladimir Putin region, the largest production of solar energy components in Russia has been opened. It is located on the territory of the industrial park of Churchovsk.
12:59, 26 January
The public debt of the Kola Polar increased to 22.3 billion roubles
As of 1 January, the province of Murman increased by 2 billion roubles compared with the previous year, to 22.3 billion roubles.
11:44, 26 January
Funding for the Murmansk region decreased by almost 3 billion roubles
In the Minfin region, Murmansk province submitted an annual report on the implementation of the regional budget in 2023. Its expenditure was 128.1 billion roubles, which is less than 2022 by almost 3 billion roubles (2 per cent).
11:34, 26 January
The financial expert reported on the benefits of loan repayment
The financial expert, Elena Altouhov, shared valuable advice with the Russians on how best to clear credit.
10:46, 26 January
In Russia, foreign bonds have begun to pay coupons
Investors have begun to earn coupon revenues from frozen foreign corporate bonds, and the Association of Owners (AWO) reports.
09:25, 26 January
Oreshkin referred to the mandatory sale of foreign exchange earnings into the Russian Federation as an effective measure
Assistant President Maxim Oreshkin said that the introduction of the mandatory sale of foreign exchange earnings for exporters had demonstrated its effectiveness.
21:43, 25 January
The Central Bank of the Russian Federation prepares Russians for a new currency
The Central Bank of the Russian Federation is actively preparing Russians for a new currency, which will become a digital rouble. The regulator plans to launch a hotline for the support of citizens who will use a new currency.
21:06, 25 January
100 million roubles will be sent to proactive budgets in Astrakhan province
The amount was doubled from 2023.
19:58, 25 January
Cuban enterprises paid over 400 million roubles of debts per year.
In 2024, specialists reviewed 100 debtor enterprises.
19:30, 25 January
Not devaluation, but much worse, the Central Bank of the Russian Federation is concerned about the situation in the country.
Despite the slowdown of inflation in the country and the decline in inflationary expectations of the population, the Central Bank of the Russian Federation is still concerned about the growth in consumer prices in the country.
18:49, 25 January
Putin stated that the real income of Rossians increased in 2023 faster than inflation.
President Vladimir Putin stated that the real incomes of Russian citizens and the level of real wages of the population as a whole had risen more than in previous years and faster than inflation.
18:38, 25 January
Meat, eggs and sausage, which increased prices in the Volgograd region in December
A number of reasons.
17:58, 25 January
Len Region expanded municipal support for SMEs
Len Region is increasing support for small and medium-sized enterprises, with 78.9 million roubles allocated from the regional budget in 2024.
17:34, 25 January
The financier predicted a dollar growth after the end of the tax period
The dollar rate will reach 90 roubles after the end of the tax period in Russia, which was predicted by Dmitri Babin, an expert on the BCS World Investment Market.
17:15, 25 January
The Bank of Russia explained price increases in the Australian stores
Considered December.
14:56, 25 January
Part of the population Bashkills will receive 750,000 roubles
In Bashkiria, the adoption of documents to receive payments from young agro specialists is under way. Financial support will be 750,000 roubles.
14:47, 25 January
Minfin had to pay a tax on the supervening even bankruptcy.
The Russian Federation has a time limit for the payment of taxes on excess profits. The business is due to pay until 28 January 2024, and this is the case of the closed companies.
12:46, 25 January
Police officers in the Murmansk region will begin to receive extra payments
The region ' s patrol and post would receive a monthly supplement of 10,000 roubles from the regional budget. Governor Andrei Chibis stated that decision in his social media.
12:16, 25 January
